page.title: 16FAMOUS ATHLETE IN MAPPERLEY
page.content: Sharon Gibson started javelin throwing at the age of 13 at her secondary school.She did other sports as well, such as netball,hockey,rounders and tennis.Her best two sports were netball and javelin.As she grew she started to do the javelin full time, so she decided to drop netball because she had to pay for equipment,but you didn't if you did javelin.Sharon started to become famous.She worked 6 houts a day and 6 days a week.She is 23 and says she will probably stop at 30.She has a coach called John Morgan. Sharon said her javelin cost 180 pounds.Her longest throw in the Olympics was 61.44m.She hopes to break the world record someday.She was very pleased that she came ninth in the Los Angeles Olympics in 1984. Leigh Camm.
